DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate analgesic efficacy safety new pain patch compare placebo treatment subject experience Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness ( DOMS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Comparing Efficacy Safety New Pain Patch Placebo Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness ( DOMS )
DOC.criteria: Males female , 18 40 year age good general health , BMI le equal 32 , able perform exercise regimen develop muscle pain/soreness within 2448 hour end exercise regimen baseline muscle pain/soreness movement great equal 5 Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) ( numerical rating scale ) least `` moderate '' categorical scale engage upper extremity exercise minimum 6 month prior study participation work heavy manual physical labor job within 3 month prior study participation . know history allergic reaction clinically significant intolerance acetaminophen , aspirin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug skin lesion psoriasis application site abnormal skin condition eczema , contact dermatitis , pigment anomaly , etc . allergyrelated skin condition
